name: Warm Water
description: Everyone's favorite drink, not too hot, not too cold: just right.
directions: Take your water and put it in the kettle (as much or as little as you want).
Wait for the water to boil or reach your preferred temperature (90°C to 100°C should suffice).
Pour the hot water out from the kettle into a cup.
Add Dihydrogen Monoxide to cup (again, this is my preference; the more you add, the colder your water becomes).
